Sentencas: Fuel cells can provide higher electrical conversion efficiency than traditional coal-fired power plants and electric generators based on internal combustion engines.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of the effects of interconnector design and operating parameters on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: In addition, high-efficiency solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) have two specific advantages compared with other fuel cells as a result of their high-temperature operation.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of the effects of interconnector design and operating parameters on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: First, SOFCs are compatible with various fuels, ranging from hydrogen to CO and hydrocarbons.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of the effects of interconnector design and operating parameters on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: Second, SOFCs generate significant amounts of exhaust heat that can be used in combined heat and power systems.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of the effects of interconnector design and operating parameters on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: Furthermore, SOFCs have quiet and vibration-free operation, eliminating the noise typically associated with power generation systems.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of the effects of interconnector design and operating parameters on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: These fuel cells also produce no or very low levels of SO2 and NO emissions.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of the effects of interconnector design and operating parameters on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: In this study, we numerically investigated the performance of a planar SOFC with different interconnector designs at various operating temperatures.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of the effects of interconnector design and operating parameters on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: Multiple parameters were considered, such as interconnection geometries, anode and cathode materials, operating temperatures, and flow rates.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of the effects of interconnector design and operating parameters on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: As a result, the horizontal sinusoidal flow channel geometry, operating temperature of 600 degrees C, hydrogen gas flow rate of 86.5 SCCM/min, and oxygen gas flow rate of 28.75 SCCM/min, NiO anode material, and LSCF cathode material provided the greatest performance in terms of energy and current density.(c) 2023 Hydrogen Energy Publications LLC.
Titulo: Numerical analysis of the effects of interconnector design and operating parameters on solid oxide fuel cell performance
